name: Brathian
description: Explore the land of Brathian, by yourself or with a friend, fighting guardians and using their powers to keep the magical crystal away from malicious hands in this retro action / platformer game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer Processor: 2ghz 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or better Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Any
